title.title: title
title.description: Title of the dataset. Initialized by dataset name, but not necessarily the same.

authors.title: authors
authors.description: In LaTeX format, i.e., Surname1, Name1 and Surname2, Name2, and so on.

time_zone.title: time zone
time_zone.description: Supported by the python-dateutil library, the same as the system.

pixel_size_unit.title: pixel size unit
pixel_size_unit.description: The base unit for pixel size, e.g., m.

pixel_size_unit_display.title: pixel size unit for display
pixel_size_unit_display.description: The display unit for pixel size, e.g., nm.

display_unit_magnify.title: display unit magnification factor
display_unit_magnify.description: Magnification factor to convert from base unit to display unit. For example, from m to nm, this value should be 1e9.

value_unit.title: value unit
value_unit.description: Base unit for measurement values, e.g., N/C for Newtons per Coulomb.

value_unit_display.title: value unit for display
value_unit_display.description: Display unit for measurement values, e.g., V/m for Volts per meter.

display_unit_magnify.title: display unit magnification factor
display_unit_magnify.description: Magnification factor to convert from base unit to display unit.

display_norm_mode.title: displaying normalization mode
display_norm_mode.description: Normalization mode for display, e.g., 'linear' or 'logarithm'.

display_colormap.title: displaying colormap
display_colormap.description: Colormap used for displaying diffraction patterns, e.g., 'viridis'.
